com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures

Interface CircleListener

  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface CircleListener
    The listener interface for receiving circle events. The class that is interested in processing a circle event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addCircleListener method. When the circle event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.
    See Also:
    CircleListener.CircleEvent, GestureDeviceManager.setCircleListener(CircleListener)

    • Method Detail

      • OnCircle

        @Deprecated
void OnCircle(CircleListener.CircleEvent e)
        Deprecated. 
        On start of a new circle. The center and starting points are part of the event. The circle direction (clockwise or counter-clockwise) is also provided.
        Parameters:
        e - the e

      • OnCircleMove

        @Deprecated
void OnCircleMove(CircleListener.CircleEvent e)
        Deprecated. 
        On circle progress. Position is relative to the start. Progress value can be 0-359, representing number of degrees from the initial start point.

        A positive step angle indicates a clockwise movement. A negative step indicates a counter clockwise movement.

        Parameters:
        e - the e

        @Deprecated
void OnCircleStop(CircleListener.CircleEvent e)
        Deprecated. 
        On circle stop.
        Parameters:
        e - the e
